admission_text:
# Hours & Admission

  * [Hours & Admission](https://boiseartmuseum.org/hours-admission/)
  * [Guidelines to Visit BAM](https://boiseartmuseum.org/hours-admission/#1590606692645-69e82421-658c)
  * [Exhibitions](https://boiseartmuseum.org/exhibitions/)
  * [Groups Visits + School Programs](https://boiseartmuseum.org/group-visits/)
  * [Calendar](https://boiseartmuseum.org/main-calendar/)
  * [Accessibility & Services](https://boiseartmuseum.org/hours-admission/#accessibility)
  * [Photography Policy](https://boiseartmuseum.org/hours-admission/#photography)
  * [BAM Store](https://boiseartmuseum.org/bam-store/)

**Schedule Your Visit  
**If you would like to schedule your visit in advance and expedite the admissions process, you may **pre-purchase your tickets online** (including members and individuals who receive free admission). We request that you schedule your visit at least 48 hours in advance.

[Purchase Admission Tickets](http://www.boiseartmuseum.org/bam-admission-purchase/)

#### Museum Manners __

**No Gum, Food, or Drink  
**Please leave gum, food, and drink at home or in your vehicle, or discard before entering the Museum. You can have a picnic in the public park or visit nearby restaurants downtown.

**Bags, Backpacks, and Strollers  
**Please leave your bags, backpacks, large strollers, and personal items at home or in your vehicle, or ask about BAM‚Äôs self-serve lockers. Child carriers can be worn on your chest. You can borrow smaller strollers from Associates at...

**Support BAM**

with a year-end charitable gift  
toward our Annual Fund

[**Please donate today** __](https://www.boiseartmuseum.org/bam-annual-appeal/)

## Monthly Programs

First Thursday ‚Äì _Access for All!_**  
****1st Thursday of each month | 10 a.m. ‚Äì 7 p.m.  
**Admission is ‚Äòpay what you can‚Äô all day**  
** BAM offers extended hours on the First Thursday of each month from 10 a.m. ‚Äì 7 p.m. along with special programs including _Studio Art Exploration_. Admission and programs are by donation.  

| **Studio Art Exploration****  
Drop-in, 4:30 ‚Äì 6:30 p.m.**_  
_ Hands-on art making in BAM‚Äôs Education Studios. _Drop-in designed for all ages. All children must be accompanied by an adult._

**December 4, 2025  
**Make an abstract painting inspired by a landscape.  
Inspired by [_Myths, Fables, and Fortunes: Our Place Within the Landscape_](https://boiseartmuseum.org/exhibition/myths-fables-and-fortunes/) **January 1, 2026 ‚Äì Closed for the Holiday** **February 5, 2026

Make a portrait using watercolor pencils.
